oauth_setup.title: OAuth2 Application Setup Required
oauth_setup.description:
Before you can use {provider} for MFA, you need to set up OAuth2 application credentials:

1. Go to Settings → Devices & Services → ⋮ → Application credentials
2. Click 'Add Application Credential'
3. Choose '{provider}' as the application
4. Enter your OAuth2 app details (client ID, client secret)
5. Use authorization domain: `{auth_domain}`

Once configured, check the box below to continue.

data.setup_complete: I have configured the OAuth2 application credentials
